! Programmer

My first executed function was stop(); in ActionScript. I know variables, conditional statements, Loops, Functions, Objects, Array & more... but almost all of the programming I’ve done is to manipulate something on a screen so I couldn't call myself a Programmer.

Portfolio

My portfolio might not be strong enough as designer as most of my experience is in development. After continuously working as Associate‑developer for more than two years on large scale applications designs, I have learned about developers mindset which can be implemented in designing. I can bring programming in my design, so move faster and handle most of the edge cases
